content.question: The function of Cynthia’s memories of her desire for a management position (line 11 and line 13) in the scene as a whole is to

choices.label: establish the destructive nature of Cynthia’s ambition
provide a justification for Cynthia’s apparent betrayal of her family and friends
show how Cynthia’s hopes for advancement have been thwarted
suggest Cynthia’s ambivalence about working on the floor

content.answer: provide a justification for Cynthia’s apparent betrayal of her family and friends

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
